document_data.mainbody:
The Golden Fox Martial Arts School was a once-renowned school in the city of Akkaido on the island of Tsukishima in Wa.
While the school was open, all individuals who reached the rank of the Master were gifted special enchanted Golden Bamboo Staves. The schools end came in the early-to-mid-14 century DR, then the Masters of the Golden Fox came into a conflict with the notorious Yakuza. By the , the Yakuza emerged victorious in the conflict, and to ensure the Golden Fox Martial Arts School would never be reestablished, they hunted down and destroyed the Golden Bamboo Staves. Even though there were seven in existence, at least one of the weapons was saved and taken out of Wa.
